title: Somethin' about Scandanavia: as told by a Danish boy
creator_contributor_role: Government Film Committee of Denmark, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Iceland - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Iceland - Social life and customs

description: This animated film gives a lighthearted resume of Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Iceland; their history and geography, main products, standard of living and dependence upon trade and co-operation for prosperity. Based on an idea by Carl T. Dreyer. Animation by Berge Hamberg.
